comment: Bourbon on the nose but not as much on the palate.

Nose: floral, sherry, herbaceous and rose petal, light 
Body: light-medium
Palate: very light, honey, grainy maltiness with spice on the end. 
Finish: short
Note: very very light and simple. Like the ex bourbon I wonder if this has rice in it, has a sake undertone. Wheated malt.
